block.p: Espionage Conviction A jury in Miami found a veteran immigration official guilty of espionage in a case that heightened tensions with Cuba. PAGE A16
Espionage Conviction A jury in Miami found a veteran immigration official guilty of espionage in a case that heightened tensions with Cuba. PAGE A16
Aristide Party Gains in Haiti The party of former President Jean-Bertrand Aristide won firm control of Haiti's Senate in the May 21 vote, preliminary results show. PAGE A7
U.S. Revises Peru Criticism The State Department has backed away from confrontational language it used about the re-election of President Alberto K. Fujimori. PAGE A5
Devils Romp in Opener New Jersey stunned the defending champion Dallas Stars, 7-3, in Game 1 of the Stanley Cup finals. SPORTSWEDNESDAY, PAGE D1
